metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values found in the 'Area Type' column.
flag_mapping.2: Negative values detected in the 'Price' column.
flag_mapping.4: Mismatch between numeric count column 'Bathrooms' and related text column 'Size'.

1.description: Contradictory values found in the 'Area Type' column.
1.fix_approach: Investigate and correct the inconsistent values in the 'Area Type' column.

2.description: Negative values detected in the 'Price' column.
2.fix_approach: Review and address the negative values in the 'Price' column.

4.description: Mismatch between numeric count column 'Bathrooms' and related text column 'Size'.
4.fix_approach: Ensure the count in the 'Bathrooms' column corresponds accurately to the values in the 'Size' column.
